---
layout: cheatsheet
tags: hex
logo: data:image/svg+xml;base64,
section:
  - name: xxd
    commands:
      File to Hex: xxd file.bin
      String to Hex: echo example | xxd
      String to Hexdump (without ascii view): echo example | xxd -p
      Hexdump to Binary: echo 746573740a | xxd -p -r
---
